column5: Tried this on today for my crankbait casting rod, first time. Super smooth. Casts a mile with spinning gear. I hope it’s as strong and durable as Nonofil.  The inevitable incidental Muskie will let me know soon enough
Looking forward to your long term assessment of it. Ten times 2.2 is 22 right? lol
On the box it lists it's "break size" as 10lb in USA but 12.1kg in Europe.
